modName: Through the Fire and the Safety Dance - Main Menu Theme
summary: This replaces themain menu theme with the song "Through the Fire and the Safety Dance" by Crap Mashups from soundcloud.
descriptionHtml:
This replaces the main menu theme with the song "Through the Fire and the Safety Dance" by Crap Mashups from soundcloud.

The song can be found here https://soundcloud.com/crapmashups/through-the-safety-and-the-dance and it includes a free download.

All credit for the song goes to it's creator, and credit for making this mod possible goes to the "XWM to WAV Conversion" tool uploaded by [b]arecaidianfox[/b]
author: eliteospartaox
